weightprior

PURPOSE

Compute exponential prior on edge weights. Remember we're now working

SYNOPSIS

function lp = weightprior(w, beta);

DESCRIPTION 

 Compute exponential prior on edge weights.  Remember we're now working
 in log weight space

0001 function lp = weightprior(w, beta);
0002 
0003 % Compute exponential prior on edge weights.  Remember we're now working
0004 % in log weight space
0005 
0006 % w is weight, but we want prior on corresponding log weight v
0007 lp = sum (-log(beta) - 2*log(w)-1./(beta*w) +log(w));
0008 
0009 % gamma with shape = 2
